      • checkNullString

        public String checkNullString(Object string)
        Checks to see if the application for this domain treats null strings as equal to empty strings. If so, this will convert "" to null.
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:

      • compare

        public int compare(Task task,
                   AttributeInstance attributeInstance,
                   AttributeDef attributeDef,
                   Object internalValue,
                   Object externalValue)
        StringDomain needs to override compare() because it potentially needs to convert empty strings ("") to null before doing the comparison.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface Domain
        Overrides:
        compare in class AbstractDomain
        attributeInstance - If not null, the is the target attribute. May be null; this can happen when converting a value to be used in generated SQL.
        attributeDef - TODO
        internalValue - - Internal attribute value.
        Returns:
        -1 if o1 < o2 0 if o1 = o2 1 if o1 > o2

      • generateRandomTestValue

        public Object generateRandomTestValue(Task task,
                                      AttributeDef attributeDef,
                                      EntityInstance entityInstance)
        Generate a RANDOM test value for this domain. This is used by test code to create RANDOM test data.
        Specified by:
        generateRandomTestValue in interface Domain
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        attributeDef - def of the attribute.
        entityInstance - if not null this is the EntityInstance that will store the test data.
